trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 加密中的 <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 此類別代表`<EncryptedKey>`中 XML 加密項目。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is used to send encryption keys.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptedKey>`元素用來傳送加密金鑰。

trans-unit.source: It can be created in a stand-alone XML document, be placed within an application document, or be inside an `<EncryptedData>` element as a child of a `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: 它可以建立獨立的 XML 文件中、 放置於應用程式文件內或內`<EncryptedData>`做為子系的項目`<KeyInfo>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The key value is always encrypted to the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 收件者永遠加密金鑰的值。

trans-unit.source: When `<EncryptedKey>` is decrypted, the resulting key is made available to the `<EncryptionMethod>` algorithm without any additional processing.
trans-unit.target: 當`<EncryptedKey>`會解密，產生的金鑰才可以提供給`<EncryptionMethod>`演算法，而不需要任何額外的處理。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptedKey>` element is similar to the `<EncryptedData>` element of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class except that the data encrypted is always a key value.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptedKey>`項目是類似於`<EncryptedData>`元素<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>類別不同處在於加密的資料永遠都是索引鍵的值。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: For more information on XML encryption standards, see the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing document at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 XML 加密語法和處理文件在http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。

trans-unit.source: Adds a<see langword="" />reference element to the <see langword="&lt;ReferenceList&gt;" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 新增<see langword="" />參考項目至 <see langword="&lt;ReferenceList&gt;" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference" /> object to add to the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see langword="<DataReference>" /> element to the <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see langword="<DataReference>" /> 項目新增至 <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會加入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataReference>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `<DataReference>` element points to encrypted data that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<DataReference>`加密使用中指定的金鑰進行加密的資料點的項目`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference" /> object to add to the <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference" /> 屬性的 <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see langword="<KeyReference>" /> element to the <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see langword="<KeyReference>" /> 項目新增至 <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: This method adds A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference> object to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A> property of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將 A<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyReference>物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey.ReferenceList%2A>屬性<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `<KeyReference>` element points to an encrypted key that was encrypted using the key specified in the `<EncryptedKey>` element.
trans-unit.target: `<KeyReference>`項目會指向使用中指定的金鑰加密的加密金鑰`<EncryptedKey>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <see langword="<CarriedKeyName>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密中選擇性的 <see langword="<CarriedKeyName>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a name for the key value.
trans-unit.target: 表示機碼值名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: The `<CarriedKeyName>` element is an optional element that associates a user-readable name with a key value.
trans-unit.target: `<CarriedKeyName>`項目是選擇性項目關聯的索引鍵值的使用者可讀名稱。

trans-unit.source: This name can then be used to reference the key using the `<KeyName>` element within the `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個名稱可以再用來參考索引鍵使用`<KeyName>`內的項目`<KeyInfo>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The same `<CarriedKeyName>` element value, unlike an ID value, can occur multiple times within a single document.
trans-unit.target: 相同`<CarriedKeyName>`元素的值，不同於為識別碼的值，可以發生多次單一文件中。

trans-unit.source: The value of the key must be the same in all `<EncryptedKey>` elements identified with the same `<CarriedKeyName>` name within an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵的值必須是相同的所有`<EncryptedKey>`具有相同識別的項目`<CarriedKeyName>`XML 文件中的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Note that because white space is significant in the value of the `<KeyName>` element, white space is also significant in the value of the `<CarriedKeyName>` element.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為空白字元很重要的值中`<KeyName>`項目，泛空白字元也是重要的值中`<CarriedKeyName>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> 物件的 XML 表示。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> that represents the <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />，表示 XML 加密中的 <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to output the `<EncryptedKey>` element in XML.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來輸出`<EncryptedKey>`中 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey" /> 值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> representing an XML element to use for the <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" />，代表要做為 <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> 項目使用的 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified XML information into the <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 XML 資訊載入 XML 加密的 <see langword="<EncryptedKey>" /> 項目中。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to load an existing XML element into the `<EncryptedKey>` element represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來載入到現有的 XML 項目`<EncryptedKey>`所代表的項目<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter does not contain a <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData" /> element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數不包含 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.CipherData" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional <see langword="Recipient" /> attribute in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密中的選擇性 <see langword="Recipient" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the value of the <see langword="Recipient" /> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示 <see langword="Recipient" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The `<Recipient>` attribute is an optional attribute that contains information about which recipient this encrypted key value is intended for.
trans-unit.target: `<Recipient>`屬性是選擇性的屬性，其中包含此加密金鑰值適用於讓收件者的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Its contents are application dependent.
trans-unit.target: 內容則相依的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> element in XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密中的 <see langword="<ReferenceList>" /> 項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.ReferenceList" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The `<ReferenceList>` element is an optional element that contains pointers to data and keys encrypted using this key.
trans-unit.target: `<ReferenceList>`項目是選擇性項目，其中包含資料和使用此金鑰來加密金鑰的指標。

trans-unit.source: The reference list can contain multiple references to the `<EncryptedKey>` and `<EncryptedData>` elements using the `<KeyReference>` and `<DataReference>` elements respectively.
trans-unit.target: 參考清單可以包含多個參考`<EncryptedKey>`和`<EncryptedData>`項目使用`<KeyReference>`和`<DataReference>`元素分別。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example then displays the values of various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> class to the console.
trans-unit.target: 此範例接著會顯示各種屬性的值<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>類別到主控台。
